sentence.Network_en: Cookery Editor Moyra Fraser takes you behind the scenes.

sentence.Network_en: Mexican cookery is economical, she says. Nothing goes to waste.
sentence.Network_cn: “墨西哥的烹调注重俭省，”她说，“任何东西都不会浪费。”

sentence.Network_en: The cookery course was serious and hedonistic at the same time.
sentence.Network_cn: 烹饪课既是一件严肃的事又是一种享受。

entry.def: Cookery is the activity of preparing and cooking food.

example.ex: The school runs cookery courses throughout the year.
example.tran: 这个学校常年开设烹饪学习班。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of preparing something (as food) by the application of heat;

sentences.sentence: "people are needed who have experience in cookery"
"he left the preparation of meals to his wife"

sentences.en: He took lessons in Thai cookery.
sentences.cn: 他上了泰式烹饪的课程。

sentences.en: I don’t understand television’s current obsession with cookery programmes.
sentences.cn: 我不明白为什么现在电视里有如此多烹饪节目。

sentences.en: Before he leaves home, he needs to learn some basic cookery.
sentences.cn: 离家之前，他需要学点基本的烹饪技巧。
